section:
Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.FileSystems.Models.IEnvironmentProvider.RelativePath Class Reference Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.FileSystems.Models.IEnvironmentProvider.RelativePath Inheritance diagram for Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.FileSystems.Models.IEnvironmentProvider.RelativePath: Collaboration diagram for Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.FileSystems.Models.IEnvironmentProvider.RelativePath: Public Member Functions RelativePath (string relativePathString, bool isDirectory, IEnvironmentProvider environmentProvider) Properties PathType PathType = PathType.RelativePath [get] bool IsDirectory [get, protected set] IEnvironmentProvider EnvironmentProvider [get] List< AncestorDirectory > AncestorDirectoryList = new() [get] string NameNoExtension [get, protected set] string ExtensionNoPeriod [get, protected set] int UpDirDirectiveCount [get] UpDirDirectiveCount refers to the ".." in "../Todos/myFile.cs". In this example the count is 1. Given "./Folder/file.txt". The count is 0. Given "../../../Homework/math.txt". The count is 3. AncestorDirectory? ParentDirectory [get] string? ExactInput [get] Given: "/Repos\\BlazorCrudApp\\"
Then: is "/Repos\BlazorCrudApp\"

Given: "\Repos/BlazorCrudApp/"
Then: is "\Repos/BlazorCrudApp/"

Overall reasoning: is to return the user input exactly as they gave it originally. string Value [get] Value is the path as a string, but with all directory separating characters having been standardized to be IEnvironmentProvider.DirectorySeparatorChar. string NameWithExtension [get] Given: { "somePath.txt", NOT_DIRECTORY } Then: NameWithExtension is "somePath.txt" Given: { "somePath.txt", IS_DIRECTORY } Then: NameWithExtension is "somePath.txt/" Given: { "somePath", NOT_DIRECTORY } Then: NameWithExtension is "somePath" Given: { "somePath", IS_DIRECTORY } Then: NameWithExtension is "somePath/" Given: { "somePath/", NOT_DIRECTORY } Then: throw new Exception('File names cannot contain directory separators'); Given: { "somePath/", IS_DIRECTORY } Then: NameWithExtension is "somePath/". Additional Inherited Members Static Public Member Functions inherited from Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.FileSystems.Models.IRelativePath static IRelativePath Factory (string path, bool isDirectory, IEnvironmentProvider environmentProvider) One might prefer IEnvironmentProvider.RelativePathFactory(string, bool) instead of this method..
